name: Taxi Tangle
description:
Your role as the Air Traffic Controller is to assist the Pilots as they taxi through a tangled runway. Are you up for the challenge or will your flights be delayed?

Taxi Tangle is an airplane themed game with simple controls and exciting puzzles.

Gameplay Includes:
- In-game tutorials
- 48 levels of increasing difficulty
- 2 randomly generated levels to maximize replayability.
- Earn rankings based on your performance.
- Multiple block types are introduce to increase the challenge as you progress.
- Exciting scenarios that include inbound and outbound air traffic as well as multiple planes at once.
- Customize your game by selecting your inbound and outbound plane.
- Fun alternate plane types to unlock as you play.
